title: Retrieve your account statement
description: Gets the member ledger for the authenticated user.
permission_required: MyTradeMeRead: Read your membership & listing data.

path.name: filter
path.description: A time-based filter on the results. AllReturn member ledger records from the last 365 days.Last60DaysReturn member ledger records from the last 60 days.Last45DaysReturn member ledger records from the last 45 days.Last28DaysReturn member ledger records from the last 28 days.Last14DaysReturn member ledger records from the last 14 days.Last7DaysReturn member ledger records from the last 7 days.Last24HoursReturn member ledger records from the last 24 hours.

query.name: page
query.description: The page number of the set of results to return, starting from 1. Defaults to 1.

query.name: rows
query.description: The number of results per page; also the maximum number of results to return. Defaults to 50.

query.name: type
query.description: A filter on the type of results returned.

returns.description: <MemberLedger> The member ledger for the authenticated user.

fields.name: TotalCount
fields.description: The total number of results in the collection. Can be larger than the number of returned results.

fields.name: Page
fields.description: The index of the current page of results (starts at 1).

fields.name: PageSize
fields.description: The number of results in the current page.

fields.name: List
fields.description: A list of the results in the current page.

enum_values.name: Other
enum_values.description: An unknown ledger item.

enum_values.name: ListingFee
enum_values.description: The fee for a listing an item (applies to classifieds and auctions in certain categories).

enum_values.name: HighVolumeFee
enum_values.description: The fee for exceeding the free listing allowance.

enum_values.name: SuccessFeeBid
enum_values.description: The fee for a successful auction (won via a bid).

enum_values.name: SuccessFeeOffer
enum_values.description: The fee for a successful auction (won via a fixed price offer).

enum_values.name: SuccessFeeBuyNow
enum_values.description: The fee for a successful auction (won via Buy Now).

enum_values.name: GalleryPromotion
enum_values.description: The fee for listing an item with the gallery promotion.

enum_values.description: The fee for listing an item with the gallery plus promotion.

nested_fields.description: The amount to credit to the member's account.
The amount to debit from the member's account.
The balance of the member's account after the transaction. This field is not populated when filtering by transaction type.
For ledger entries that relate to a listing, this field contains the listing ID. For other types of ledger entries, the contents of this field should be ignored.
For ledger entries that relate to a specific purchase, this field contains the purchase ID.
The SKU for the listing, if any.
The unique identifier for this ledger item.
